item.title: By: Shane
item.dc:creator: Shane
item.description: My bad, thought there was a new post and got excited! It was the what about Simone Weil paper I’d already read. Not sure I can get notified of posts or how to but will check back on occasion. Not even quite sure how I stumbled here in the first place but happy to have done so. Hopefully you still have some more insight forthcoming.
item.content:encoded: My bad, thought there was a new post and got excited! It was the what about Simone Weil paper I’d already read. Not sure I can get notified of posts or how to but will check back on occasion. Not even quite sure how I stumbled here in the first place but happy to have done so. Hopefully you still have some more insight forthcoming.

item.title: By: Shane
item.dc:creator: Shane
item.description: Very much appreciate these writings. I definitely think there is more to Simone Weil’s connection to TOP. I think some of her writings would show up prevalently in their songs.
item.content:encoded: Very much appreciate these writings. I definitely think there is more to Simone Weil’s connection to TOP. I think some of her writings would show up prevalently in their songs.

item.title: By: Party Poison
item.dc:creator: Party Poison
item.description: Your TØP theories are incredible and very helpful right now, I can’t wait to hear what else you come up with! I linked your blog to a group of clique conspiracy theorists so I apologize if they bombard you with questions once they realize the impressive resources you offer.
item.content:encoded: Your TØP theories are incredible and very helpful right now, I can’t wait to hear what else you come up with! I linked your blog to a group of clique conspiracy theorists so I apologize if they bombard you with questions once they realize the impressive resources you offer.
